definition: modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
surname Ma
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
lama, spiritual teacher in Tibetan Buddhism
Dalai Lama
Lamaism/Tibetan Buddhism
Panchen Lama
Om Mani Padme Hum (Sanskrit), or Om Mani Peme Hung (Tibetan), the Avalokiteshvara mantra
pinyin: an3 ma5 ni2 ba1 mi1 hong1

definition: lamasery/temple of Tibetan Buddhism
either .../or ...

sentences.english: This is just like robbing Peter to pay Paul.
sentences.chinese: 這根本是挖東牆補西牆嘛。

sentences.english: Little Boys and Girls, Will You Come and Ride with Me on My Broomstick?
sentences.chinese: 小男孩和女孩，你們能一起來騎在掃把上飛嘛？

sentences.english: As to the 3rd, have to count roundlet desk to go up that " antependium " .
sentences.chinese: 至於第三嘛，就得數小圓桌上的那塊“桌布”了。

sentences.english: How about read Breakfast at Tiffanys at lunchtime?
sentences.chinese: 午餐時間讀《蒂凡尼的早餐》也不錯嘛。

sentences.english: That they buy T-shirts for and spout off about endlessly?
sentences.chinese: 無非就是買了件t恤什麼的至於說個沒完嘛。

sentences.english: The conceited man, always can't help crowing in a swoop.
sentences.chinese: 那些自負的人嘛，總會不由地雞鳴於鶴羣之中。

sentences.english: Madam, it's not worth to take risk, your life is precious.
sentences.chinese: 夫人，划不來嘛，你的命很值錢的。

sentences.english: Well, don’t be too narrow-minded. There are lots of good bands out there.
sentences.chinese: 哎，別那麼眼光狹窄嘛，有很多非常不錯的樂隊呢。

sentences.english: Is this a copy for reproduction?
We were good partners in former days.
sentences.chinese: 怎麼說我們以前也是好搭檔嘛。

sentences.english: Chickens also died from the lack of temperature control.
sentences.chinese: 擱有，雞仔因爲溫度箱峘無法度控制嘛攏死去。

sentences.english: Shanwei was originally a port city.
sentences.chinese: 汕尾本來就是一個港口城市嘛。

sentences.english: And I am responsible for gathering the berries for you all to taste later.
sentences.chinese: 我負責給大家摘野果，嚐個新鮮嘛。

sentences.english: Basically, "People are not sages; who can be without faults?"
sentences.chinese: 本來嘛，“人非聖賢，孰能無過？”

sentences.english: I don't have money to buy them, but I can go there and listen. You know you don't have to pay for listening.
sentences.chinese: 雖然沒錢買，但是可以去聽嘛，聽又不要錢。

definition: anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
(onom.) laughing out loud
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
(a groaning sound)
(nonverbal grunt as interjection)/OK, yeah/what?
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
exclamatory final particle
interrogative final particle
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
tiny/insignificant
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
battle cry
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
(onom.) gentle laughter/chuckle
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
hey (to call sb)
hey (to express agreement)
hey (to express disagreement)
hey (to express surprise)
sigh (to express regret)
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
(onom.) smack!
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
it doesn't matter
right or wrong?/Is it right?/OK, yes? (colloquial)
